--- select_singer_with_table_alias.sql
SELECT
  S.*,
  S.SingerId as ID,
  S.FirstName
FROM Singers S

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Expr: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    end:      62,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    List:     parser.SelectExprList{
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  9,
        end:  12,
        Expr: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  9,
          end:  10,
          Name: "S",
        },
        Star: true,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  16,
        end:  32,
        Expr: &parser.SelectorExpr{
          Left: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  16,
            end:  17,
            Name: "S",
          },
          Right: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  18,
            end:  26,
            Name: "SingerId",
          },
        },
        Star: false,
        As:   &parser.Ident{
          pos:  30,
          end:  32,
          Name: "ID",
        },
      },
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  36,
        end:  47,
        Expr: &parser.SelectorExpr{
          Left: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  36,
            end:  37,
            Name: "S",
          },
          Right: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  38,
            end:  47,
            Name: "FirstName",
          },
        },
        Star: false,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
    },
    From: parser.FromItemList{
      &parser.FromItem{
        end:  62,
        Expr: &parser.TableName{
          end:   62,
          Ident: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  53,
            end:  60,
            Name: "Singers",
          },
          Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
          As:   &parser.Ident{
            pos:  61,
            end:  62,
            Name: "S",
          },
        },
        Method: "",
        Num:    nil,
        Rows:   false,
      },
    },
    Where:   nil,
    GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
    Having:  nil,
    OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT S.*, S.SingerId AS ID, S.FirstName FROM Singers AS S
